quote: I've been told my old city possesses a 'thriving arts scene,' whatever that is; personally, I think artists should lie low and stick to their work, not line-dance through the parks.
quote_letters: IVE BEEN TOLD MY OLD CITY POSSESSES A THRIVING ARTS SCENE WHATEVER THAT IS PERSONALLY I THINK ARTISTS SHOULD LIE LOW AND STICK TO THEIR WORK NOT LINE-DANCE THROUGH THE PARKS
source: Walter Kirn, Up in the Air
